thread.title: Allman's Butch Trucks wife calls 911 after he shot himself | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Allman's Butch Trucks wife calls 911 after he shot himself | Daily Mail Online

author: Jose Lambiet In West Palm Beach
title: Allman's Butch Trucks wife calls 911 after he shot himself | Daily Mail Online
text: EXCLUSIVE: 'My husband just shot himself. I can't look at him.' Hysterical wife of Allman Brothers drummer Butch Trucks' 911 CALL revealed after she witnessed his suicide at their waterfront Florida condo WARNING: DISTURBING CONTENT The wife of Allman Brothers Band drummer Butch Trucks screamed into the phone seconds after a loud noise that sounds like a gunshot Trucks died last week in his waterfront condo in West Palm Beach, Florida at the age of 69 of a self-inflicted gun shot would to the head His wife Melinda saw him pull the trigger and dialed 911 at 6:02 p.m. Although he was breathing when police arrived, Trucks expired seconds later Palm Beach County court records show Trucks appeared to be wrestling with financials problems In 2011, Trucks had to sell his prized home in Palm Beach for $2 million when it was possibly worth twice as much to pay off a $800,000 mortgage Last year, the IRS filed two liens against the condo to force Trucks to pay additional taxes for 2013 and 2014 for a total of more than $540,000 He was considered by Rolling Stone magazine as one of the top 10 drummers in rock history Published: 15:33 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 15:54 GMT, 1 February 2017 127 shares
